meta.description: There are no laws requiring informed consent for vaccine food.

title: American Farmers To Begin Injecting Livestock With mRNA Shots This Month
cleaned_text:
The unvaccinated have managed to evade the experimental mRNA technology deployed in Big Pharma’s COVID vaccines.

But not for long, because very soon mRNA will be injected into your food.

Don’t miss this important report breaking down how fatal COVID shots were disproportionately sent to red states, further suggesting the establishment knew the shots were harmful and wanted to target conservatives:
